Summary: Object, because of it's distance, appeared starlike- was sitting outside and objedt was riisng over Atlantic ocean slowly in a straigtht line, faster thann a star or Venus and was bright yellow.
divs: Sighting Detailswas sitting about two blocks from atlantic ocean -was dark outside at that time-saw a distant object seemingly rising in a straight line at about 60-65 degrees to my right- watched it for several minutes and then it disappeared behind a grove of trees and never saw it again. the only reason I'm reporting it is because of it's color which was a pure bright yellow[did not give off sunlight as I've seen sattelites that reflected grayish white sunlight. It was just a pure fairly bright yellow. I've never heard of any aircraft that projected nothing but yellow light. Hope to hear from someone.I'm not yet amember, but anyone who is Sincerely interested may call me on my cell phone (phone number deleted)fg First name is (name deleted)fg.
trends: There have been no other sightings in same as above
This sighting has never been favorited.
